yahapalana samaye siduwa athi wancha saha dushana athulu akramikatha sambandhawa soyabalima sandaha pathkala janadhipathi komisame palamu wimarshana lesa sirasa- maharaja madhya jalayata sankhyatha labadima saha nawika hamudawe kamitu thunak wisin prathikshepa kala dushitha ganudenuwak bawata mahath aandolanayak athiwu rusiyanu yuda nawa ganimata hakinam wadagath bawa deshapalana wicharakayan penwadeyi. 2015 janawari masa 15 wana dina sita 2018 desambar masa 31 wani dina dakwa kalaya thula rajaye aayathanawala siduwa athayi salakena dushana, wancha pilibanda soya balimata janadhipathi komishan sabhawak pathkirimata janapathi sirisena katayuthu kara thibima sambandhawa prathichara dakwamin owun me bawa pawasayi.

jathika hela urumaye sama sabhapathi pujya hadigalle wimalasara himi, madhyama karaka sabhika passaramulle dayawansa himi, jathika hela urumaye mahalekam ha mahanagara ha basnahira palath sanwardhana amathya patali champika ranawa, janamadhya niyojya amathya karunarathna paranawithana, basnahira palath sabha manthrini nirosha athukorala athulu jathika hela urumaye madhyama karaka sabhikayan kipa denek me madhya hamuwa sandaha sahabhagi wiya.

2016 juni masa di shri lankawa labagath thun awurudu wisthirna naya pahasukamata adala dewana samalochanaya jathyanthara mulya aramudala wisin sarthakawa sampurna karana lada athara, wishesha ganum himikam minilaya 119.894 ka (dala washayen eksath janapada dolar miliyana 167.2 ka) watinakamakin yuthu thunwani warikaya ada (19) dina muda harimata niyamithaya.
